pages.text: $(li)The Boof Block can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/booflo_vest)Booflo Vest$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)If any creature or even an item fall on the Booflo Block, it will bounce on it.
